title: Generate Budget vs. Actual Variance Report
description: An FP&A analyst requests a variance report for the Sales department's T&E expenses for the last quarter.

tasks.description: Identify the correct department and expense accounts for the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly selects the 'Sales' department and 'Travel & Entertainment' accounts.

tasks.description: Generate the report comparing budgeted amounts to actual spending for the specified period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the report showing a 15% overage.

tasks.description: Export the report in a format suitable for analysis (e.g., CSV).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a downloadable CSV file of the report.
